CustomField.description: Defines a duration in seconds to monitor overdue tasks starting from a task creation date. Once scheduling interval is reached then system stops calculating jeopardy statuses for tasks and order due dates (i.e. scheduling is expired). This setting allows to switch off Orchestration Plan re-scheduling after some period of time. Orders and Order Items with expired scheduling are not updated.
CustomField.label: Scheduling Expiration Interval (Seconds)
